instructions: Tap the Phone app to open it. Tap the Voicemail tab. In the Voicemail screen, tap Greeting . In the Greeting screen, tap Custom . This is where you'll record your voicemail greeting and stop using the default voicemail greeting. Tap Record and start speaking. When you're done recording the voicemail greeting, tap Stop . To listen to the greeting you just recorded, tap Play . If you aren't happy with the results, tap Record again and record a new greeting. When you're happy with the greeting and want to use it, tap Save .
